publ: by Gomathy Shankaran (DBA Kidz Learn Applications)
name: SportsListCalendar
0:
”Alexa open sports list calendar”
”NFL”
”whats happening on July 5th 2022”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: sports list calendar
Developer Terms of Use
des: This Alexa app will read out the NFL, IPL, FIBA, and FIFA sports events schedules for the selected date after choosing the sports . First, Alexa will prompt user to say the name of the sport that he/she needs the events list - "NFL", 'FIBA', "IPL" or FIFA". Make sure you specify the year while telling the date. The user can use utterances like "Get me events for today". "get me events on November 26th 2022" to get the schedule details. The user can also set a reminder for a future sport event.
